rows.label: tlk001201_05_msg0001
rows.name:
I did a terrible thing to you, and for
that, I must apologize.

rows.label: tlk001201_05_msg0002
rows.name:
The third Holy Grail's sword that unlocks the
true power of the Holy Grail is said to be
sealed away somewhere in Liberalitas.

rows.label: tlk001201_05_msg0003
rows.name:
The power of the Holy Grail,
I entrust to you...

rows.label: tlk001201_05_msg0004
rows.name:
Zeke. I trust you will guide the Holy Grail
on her mission, and act as bodyguard
to the boy.

rows.label: tlk001201_05_msg0005
rows.name:
I saw a determination in his eyes,
a hope that shone so brilliantly...
That is something we cannot lose.

rows.label: tlk001201_05_msg0006
rows.name:
Sure thing.
Just leave it to the Zekenator!

rows.label: tlk001201_05_msg0007
rows.name:
Still as immature as always, I see.
When are you going to grow up?

rows.label: tlk001201_05_msg0008
rows.name: Uhuh. Never heard that one before...
